description: A materialized view is a type of table that is automatically built from a Synapse SQL query. The SQL of the materialized view may contain JOIN clauses on multiple tables.

definingSQL.description: The synapse SQL statement that defines the data in the materialized view. The SQL may contain JOIN clauses on multiple tables.

columnIds.description: The columns of a materialized view are dynmaic based on the select statement of the definingSQL. This list of columnIds is for read only, and will be ignored for create and update opperations.
